title: Sona's power cord is consumed when attacking a ward made by Farsight Orb
body: Sona's power cord is used when attacking the ward made by Farsight Orb, but not when attacking any other ward. It occurs whenever attacking the ward, and can be replicated quite easily. It doesn't heavily affect her but could always be something to improve.

replies.body:
Hiya Dreek Learon! 

Thanks for the report! We'll investigate the issue!
